ul.li: Maintain current level of cognitive function as long as possible
Maintain ability to perform basic activities of daily living (ADLs) with minimal assistance
Reduce frequency and severity of behavioral and psychological symptoms of dementia
Ensure adherence to prescribed dementia medications
Provide support and education to caregiver to reduce burden and improve coping
Maintain fasting plasma glucose within the prediabetes range through lifestyle modification and self-management.
Achieve and maintain hemoglobin A1c within the prediabetes target range through self-management strategies.
Engage in regular physical activity, follow a balanced diet, and monitor blood glucose as part of the diabetes self-management plan.

tr.td: Vaccine product containing only Influenza virus antigen (medicinal product)
